qa_pairs.a: You just killed every cat in Denver.
You just killed every cat in Denver.
Thank you. No..

qa_pairs.q: Will I be a pop star?
qa_pairs.a: There is as much chance of you being a pop star or a rock star as me flying to the moon tomorrow morning for breakfast. It's never going to happen.
It was a little bit like... uh... annoying girl singing in the bedroom..
Last year, I described someone as being the worst singer in America. I think you're possibly the worst singer in the world.
It was a bit like ordering a hamburger and only getting the bun.

qa_pairs.q: I think I have so much potential
qa_pairs.a: Don't sing again..
I'm not being rude, but you were that bad honestly. I mean my pen has got more charisma.

qa_pairs.q: Could I be the next american idol?
qa_pairs.a: If your lifeguard duties were as good as your singing, a lot of people would be drowning.
It says here you work as a wedding singer? How many ended in divorce?.
You've just invented a new form of torture..

qa_pairs.q: Will I go through to the next round?
qa_pairs.a: I can honestly say you're the worst singer in America.

qa_pairs.q: What did you think of my audition?
qa_pairs.a: That whole audition was something I would expect to hear outside Magic Mountain at Disney..
That was exactly identical to a nightmare I had last week..

qa_pairs.q: What did you think of my outfit?
qa_pairs.a: You look like a pen salesman..
You better hope there's a lot of girls watching this with the volume turned down..
Well, if you were to move on, it would be without me judging this competition.

qa_pairs.q: Would you like to hear more?
qa_pairs.a: I couldn't hear anymore.
I think you invented notes never ever before heard in music on that audition.
You couldn't win this competition if you were the only one in it... in a million years..
Can I stop this? Because I'm bored out of my mind..
There are only so many words I can drag out of my vocabulary to say how awful that was..
I was bored to tears throughout the entire song..

qa_pairs.q: Could I make a career out of this?
qa_pairs.a: You will never, ever, ever be a singer.
If you had lived 2,000 years ago and sung like that, I think they would have stoned you..
